# <code>math sqrt</code> for math

<div class='command-title'>Applies the square root function to a list of numbers</div>

## Signature

```> math sqrt```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Apply the square root function to a list of numbers
```shell
  > [9 16] | math sqrt
```
